script_0: you haven't?! I changed my hairstyle, you stupid worthless commoner!
ugh, this job is killing me. give me a massage!
get me a drink too! and don't make me wait!
if you do your job right, i'll let you have some REQUEST.
and, if you're lucky, as a bonus, i'll write 'NO. 1 SERVANT' on it.
you got it? now hurry up!
